result.arabic_text: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
result.translation: Ese abahakanyi banyu (b’i Maka) ni bo beza kurusha abo (abantu ba Adi, aba Thamudi, aba Nuhu n’aba Farawo, boretswe)? Cyangwa mufite ubudahangarwa bwanditse mu bitabo (bwo kutazahanwa)?
